name: Forget me not (WeaverGameDev)
description:
Concept level for an isometric game about an amnesiac waking up in an apartment, trying to find clues as to who they are.

Features implemented so far:
- Concept level with placeholder furniture
- Basic isometric movement
- Basic character animations (idle & walk)

Future features:
- non-placeholder furniture
- character model
- interactions with objects
- dialogue

Controls:

W A S D - Movement
